      • getCommandNames

        public abstract java.lang.String[] getCommandNames()
        Gets the names of the command

        A command can have any number of names. They will all be checked for when the command is run

        Returns:
        An array containing the names of the command

      • getPermissions

        public abstract java.lang.String getPermissions()
        Gets the permissions required to run the command
        Returns:
        The required permissions

      • getHelp

        public abstract java.lang.String[] getHelp()
        Gets the help topics of the command

        Each element of the array is one line of the help message

        Returns:
        An array containing the help messages of the command

      • exec

        public abstract java.lang.String[] exec(CommandWrapper command)
                                 throws TooFewArgumentsException,
                                        TooManyArgumentsException,
                                        InvalidArgumentException,
                                        NoPermissionException,
                                        PlayerOnlyException,
                                        ConsoleOnlyException,
                                        BlockOnlyException
        Runs the command

        This method is called whenever the command is run. All elements of the return value are sent to the user who ran the command. This is the appropriate place to provide any user feedback from the command

        Returns:
        An array containing user feedback
        Throws:
        TooFewArgumentsException, - TooManyArgumentsException, InvalidArgumentException, NoPermissionException, PlayerOnlyException, ConsoleOnlyException, BlockOnlyException
        TooFewArgumentsException
        TooManyArgumentsException
        InvalidArgumentException
        NoPermissionException
        PlayerOnlyException
        ConsoleOnlyException
        BlockOnlyException
